name: Battery Chad: Shock the World
description:
An all-new classic NES platformer!

"The evil Sinkautro has filled the land with evil holes, screaming skulls, invisible walls and poison blood! Are you prepared to jump off of swinging chains, and over burning lava? Do you really think you can traverse Nefarious Nightfalls, Athletic Skies, Layer-Cake Lands, Gruesome Graveyards and Dangerous Dungeons, and still have enough energy to zap Sinklings, and defeat the villainous Sinkautro? If you’re up for the challenge, Chad, then go ahead and Shock The World!"

Initial release: September 27th, 2019

Franchise: Battery Chad
